title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: When using the SaveAs function, the file type is not preserved. Additionally, the icon for the file has changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: After performing the SaveAs function, the file is now represented by a generic file icon. When opened, the file is displayed as plain text.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original, unless explicitly changed by the user.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Make some modifications to the file
3) Click on the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog box will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Enter a filename without specifying the file extension
7) Click Ok

Observe that the file is added to the Navigator, but the file extension is not shown.
